Author: drinkpiss69420
Text: Not sure if this is helpful at all but from my experience the more you think about a certain food item or try to avoid it the more likely you are to binge on them. I say if you’re really craving something, go for it ! you’re not gonna gain a bunch of weight after eating something unless you’re like consistently eating too much of it on a day to day basis

Author: hazyjays
Text: i guess i should have prefaced this with the fact that my disorder is only seven months old + is restrictive type anorexia (meaning i’ve never binged) so the anxiety is coming from a fear of potentially binging or just not feeling as in control as usual ya feel
